L7p:Comment.stringValue: === If you have the need to customize this policy
=== please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability
This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!
=== Allow the auth-header OR parameters but NOT both if both are used

L7p:value.stringValue: overwritten in case of an error
// overwritten in case of a provided secret
Allow client credentials at one location only!
Set the location to access the database
Set the location to access the validation service
set the default required status to 'ENABLED'
if expiration is empty set it to 'true'
Set the location to access the database
Set the location to access the validation service
Set the location to access the validation service
check if the routing assertion was successful
// looked up from the database if it was a public client
must be valid, no success response otherwise
